title: 135: Q & A: FRIENDSHIP BREAKUPS
itunes:title: 135: Q & A: FRIENDSHIP BREAKUPS
description:
Today The Broads take your questions all about FRIENDSHIP BREAKUPS! They cover long distance friendship issues, processing friendship ghosting, dealing with a friend that is draining, how we all can be shitty friends, and much more! 
INSTAGRAM:

Bekah: @bekah
Jess: @thebaddmom
